Interface HadoopJob


  • public interface HadoopJob
    Compact job description.

    • Method Summary

      boolean hasCombiner()
      Checks whether job has combiner.
      boolean hasReducer()
      Checks whether job has reducer.

      Gets collection of input splits for this job.

      Gets job name.

      Gets optional configuration property for the job.

      Gets user name.

    • Method Detail

      • input

        Collection<HadoopInputSplit> input()
        Gets collection of input splits for this job.
        Returns:
        Input splits.

      • property

        @Nullable
String property(String name)
        Gets optional configuration property for the job.
        Parameters:
        name - Property name.
        Returns:
        Value or null if none.

      • hasCombiner

        boolean hasCombiner()
        Checks whether job has combiner.
        Returns:
        true If job has combiner.

      • hasReducer

        boolean hasReducer()
        Checks whether job has reducer. Actual number of reducers will be in HadoopMapReducePlan.reducers().
        Returns:
        Number of reducer.

      • reducers

        int reducers()
        Returns:
        Number of reducers configured for job.

      • jobName

        String jobName()
        Gets job name.
        Returns:
        Job name.

      • user

        String user()
        Gets user name.
        Returns:
        User name.
